name: Gardening
description:
The goal is to improve the soil quality in cooperation with earthworms. The better the soil, the greener it is

Cursor keys move the character, first button to launch seeds or get things, second button to change currently selected item.

* Plant seeds in front of worms, so they will enter soil and help it to improve soil quality.
* If the hen (chicken) detect a worm, il will eat it, so take care to protect them as much as possible. When the hen eat a work, it lay an egg. if the egg is not taken immediately it will become a chick. The eggs can be used to improve soil too by adding calcium and other elements.

* Youn can pick fruits from plants to grow your seeds

Game started in jully 2021, see https://tic80.com/play?cart=2000
